long_description: The waterproof OtterBox iPhone 5 Armor case provides serious protection for your phone, helping guard it against drops, bumps, scratches and immersion under water. Case affords protection from up to 2 tons of crushing pressure and drops as high as 10 ft. to concrete, while still allowing you to operate all the functions of your iPhone 5. Metal latches, O-ring seal, port covers and mesh coverings seal out dust and moisture, and provide full waterproof protection down to 6.6 ft. for up to 30 min.
short_description: The waterproof OtterBox iPhone 5 Armor case provides serious protection for your phone, helping guard it against drops, bumps, scratches and immersion under water.
